1. City Council

City Council
============

* 1st and 3rd Tuesday of every month
* City Hall
  309 Cedar Street
  Hearne, TX 77859

Agendas are posted 72 hours before all meetings by the City Secretary. These documents may be examined anytime outside City Hall. You may also request copies before each session. Conversely, these copies are also available at City Hall, located at 309 Cedar Street.

* [Ruben Gomez](https://www.cityofhearne.org/168/Ruben-Gomez)
  , Mayor, Council Member Place 1
* [Ben Luster](https://www.cityofhearne.org/170/Ben-Luster)
  , Council Member Place 2
* [Emmett Aguirre](https://www.cityofhearne.org/166/Emmett-Aguirre)
  , Council Member Place 3
* [Ray Edwards](https://www.cityofhearne.org/167/Ray-Edwards)
  , Council Member Place 4

* [Margaret Salvaggio](https://www.cityofhearne.org/169/Margaret-Salvaggio)
  , Council Member Place 6
